personal.name: Shravan Revanna

personal.description: I see problems, I build solutions. AI-first full-stack developer who tries to automate everything.
personal.bio: Full-stack developer (with 150+ production projects) obsessed with shipping fast and automating everything. I dive into fundamentals, over-engineer when needed, and turn every friction point into a solved problem. Specializing in GenAI applications, AI Agentic Workflows, and production-ready systems.
intro: AI full-stack developer currently working at udaanCapital, building risk assessment systems.
Built 150+ projects including production applications with thousands of active users.
Specialized in automation, GenAI solutions, and full-stack development with modern frameworks.
Creator of NoteRep - a study platform serving 200+ active users with 85K+ views.
I write about tech, build tools that save time, and contribute to meaningful projects.
personal.goal: I build automation tools and AI-powered solutions that eliminate manual processes and save people time.

personal.name: NoteRep

personal.name: Forkcast - Plan your meals

personal.name: VigilAI - IoT Health Monitor

personal.name: Enigma Escape
personal.description: AI manipulation game where players must prompt to make LLMs respond with the specified phrases without directly asking.

featured_posts.title: Migrating the old portfolio website to Next.js 15
